source_text: [MEDITATIVE MUSIC]
There are many paths to figuring out the true nature of our reality.
The path of my journey has taken me to Sedona, Arizona several times.
And every time I leave, I find myself making plans to return.
It was one of the first discoveries I made during my research into the ET subject matter.
Sure, it was a hard one to swallow.
I remember going to an ET meetup group at the Flying Saucer Cafe in Santa Monica.
Some of the experts there said that they had spoken to several abductees who claimed to have seen these children on ships.
They said they were teaching them how to do mundane daily tasks, like go grocery shopping and wash dishes.
Well, at the time, I thought it was ridiculous.
But several years into my research, now I know it to be more true than not.
In fact, all of the extra dimensional beings I've interviewed so far have all confirmed the programs and the existence of hybrid children.
Today, I'm meeting with Bridget Nielsen, a beautiful young lady who says she can communicate directly with these hybrid children.
She claims that she can even show me how to connect to my children.
Though I have no conscious memory of being on board any ships and having my essence or sperm taken, I'm going to follow along and see where this all takes me.
[MEDITATIVE MUSIC] Ever wonder if there's intelligent life elsewhere in the universe?
Well, I have....I've been wondering since I was a kid.
My name is Reuben Langdon.
And on March 29th, 2007, in the middle of the day, I saw a number of strange objects in the sky.
Coincidentally, I was working on the film Avatar at the time, playing an alien.
And ever since then I've been on a quest...
A quest to find out if aliens truly do exist and if so... ...are they here with us?
If beings of higher intelligence are here... ...what is their purpose?
Why don't they make themselves more known?
Why the secrecy?
I've asked these questions to many experts, yet, each seems to have a different theory.
So I thought to myself, why not ask the aliens directly?
So that's what I set out to do!
Well, sort of...
Today's main topic, the alien hybrids.
Woo.
[LAUGHS]
Wild and crazy stuff...
So tell us your story.
Tell us how you got involved in the alien hybridization program.
Yeah, it's the least expected career path I would have ever thought, I guess.
Career path?
Well, it kind of is a career path.
It's like, well, it's my passion path, I guess more so.
So it's not what I would have expected.

And it started with doing a bunch of healing, different trainings that I was doing-- like I told you earlier-- doing different past life stuff, Earthbound spirits, mediumship, of those kind of things-- angels, guides.
And a part of that was abduction.
And I thought, I was cool with all the other inter-dimensional stuff, but not abduction.
And this is helping other people with their past lives.
Yeah.
So I would channel that through.
So I would, like, connect with their other lives and bring that through, or connect with their guides and communicate from them-- those kinds of things.
Before we jump ahead, can you just tell me, how did you stumble upon that work in itself?
Because that realm, it's not common for people to-- it's becoming more common, I guess.
But what led you into that path?
One, being in Los Angeles.
So that opens up that door.
Two-- you know, it was right after I got out of college.
And then I went immediately into, like, advertising, big time corporate advertising.
And just like really dove into the corporate world.

And then after that experience, as well as, like, boyfriends and my own stuff, I just went so deep into something energetically that I wasn't, that I just catapulted to another extreme of I'm going, I need to, like, look at what I really am passionate about, and look at what my gifts are.
And, like, fix my own personal stuff.
Like, why am I experiencing certain things?
And when you say deep in something you weren't, that's the corporate world?
The corporate world and stuff like that.
So you were doing the 9:00 to 5:00--
Yeah, 24 hour iPhone as the pillow kind of thing.
And then that felt not right, so then that's the catapult you're talking about.
So you went the other direction, the opposite of 9:00 to 5:00-- the opposite of corporate.
OK, gotcha.
And even as a kid, I just was very attuned to, like I loved fairies.
I loved nature.
I can sense certain things.
I could definitely feel a lot more going on with people than they knew themselves.
And I had those extra sensitivities.
And then over the years and years and years of schooling, they started to dwindle, and dwindle, go away.
And then once I hit the extreme of then going corporate after all the schooling, it was just so far, that I knew exactly where to go.
I was like, let's go back to nature.
Let's go back to my natural self.
And at that time, too, my dad was heavy into the metaphysical community in LA.
So he was going to Bashar channelings.
And he was doing channeling-like stuff himself.
And then he was connected with a shaman in Los Angeles, and we were doing family constellation work, which heals family traumas that are passed down.
And so he was in that.
And I was dabbling and I knew about it.
But once I had gone to such an extreme, I went, OK, well I need to look more at like who I am, and where is this originating from like, in my lineage?
Why am I creating certain challenge like in relationships?
What is the source of my motivations in life?
And so I started working with a shaman.
And I worked with another clairvoyant too.
And I just started learning all that they were doing.
And then I could see that I had these sensitivities too.
Once I could see them doing all of that stuff, I went, oh I can do that too.
But it was so natural, that I didn't know I was doing it.
Got you.
So then I went hmm, well, let's dive into that.
And so then I did different healing trainings.
And at that time, I didn't believe fully-- I didn't have the visceral experience of other lives, like other simultaneous incarnations.
I didn't really believe in Earthbound spirits.
It wasn't, like intellectually, it wasn't matched with my experience.

So that was one of the primary reasons that I went to do the training, was to see if it actually hit to have an experience with these different segments that people just flippantly, like, throw around.
Like, 'Oh, my past life.'
And I'm going, no, how does that relate to this here and now?
And how do you know?
Like, where's the knowingness behind that?
So I wanted to know that for myself before I just went around just saying stuff.
Right.

And so then at that training, I experienced crazy things that were-- I mean, even backed up by like Google-- certain things I was channeling of different, like, spirits and crazy things that were just--
When you say backed up by Google, what do you mean by that?
You would Google it later after you've had the experience?
Yeah, after I had the experience, it was like, what I had brought through was actually backed up by like, historically in Google, like different things that had happened.
Can you describe how?
You got us going here, for example?
For example, we were staying in a retreat center in San Diego.
And it, itself, had kind of interesting energies.
And that day, out of the two week thing, we had worked with Earthbound spirits and worked with people that had passed.
And so that night, my roommate and I were both going back and forth.
And she was from England, so she was telling me about all the ghosts in all the castles in England that she would work with and stuff.
And so we're just dialoguing.
And the door was open.
And the energy was open.
We were kind of like calling it in, I guess you could say.
And then I could perceive, I could feel beings walk into the room.
And it was three little girls that I perceived.
And at the same time I felt that, she looked in the same direction.
And so I knew that something was going on.
And we both are going oh, like, something just happened.
Right, right.
And so then, at that moment, we were like OK, this is it!
Like, something's going on.
And so I got out my pendulum.
And she's channeling too.
So both of us together were going back and forth.

And what came through, through me-- that I could hear from them-- is that there were three little girls that had been murdered on this property by this religious group, by this, like-- I guess he was some kind of bishop or something that ran a center.
And he murdered them.
And they just were stuck in this dimension, because if it's an abrupt ending or if it's unfinished, then of course, you kind of stay bound to this until it's complete.
Or if you have a drug overdose, or you get in a car accident, those kinds of things lead to where those beings need extra assistance to move into the light.
And so we worked with these little girls.
Your other friend from England, she was there too?
Simultaneously getting the same downloads?
Yes, same downloads.
So you were able to confirm with her later the same information?
Yes. >>OK.
And then at the same time too, so we sent them into the light.
We assisted them.
And then, I got on my phone on Google, and they gave me the year, they gave that it was some kind of religious guy that did it.
We knew the location, three little girls.
And I Googled it, and it was like on Google.
Like, three little girls murdered by this guy at this location.
And I'm like, oh!
So that was like my first experience of getting the information and then having it instantly validated to reinforce.
Instantly.
Google.
We can do that now on the phone.
You didn't even wait till you got home.
You went right on the phone.
Right on the phone.
I was like, OK.
Am I crazy?
So it was instantly validated.
Nice.
Yeah.
So that led you into dabbling into healing others.
You said assisting others with alien abductions?
Yeah.
So that was one baby sliver of the two weeks.
And I thought it was crazy.
But at the same time, I was open, because I had to be open.
That was my mission, was to be open, to understand.
Open, meaning transparent, telling friends and family and the world?
Open in the way of like, I was open to believing it.
I was open to acknowledging that that was their experience.
OK.
Yeah, after you've had that experience, how could you not?
Yeah.
Yeah.
So I mean, it was a different segment, but it all fits into the same thing.
And a lot of people in the spiritual community don't translate over to extraterrestrials, sometimes.
A lot of extraterrestrial people don't translate into other realms and things.
Which is, for me, I found very hard to understand those people.
Because it's like, if it's one-- I mean, if you're going to let your brain leak out, you might as well just let it--
Go all the way.
--just go full.
Full disclosure, full peanut butter, go all the way in.
Might as well.
I'm with you on all of that, yeah.
Because when you throw out all scientific logic, for one thing, why not throw it out for the other stuff?
You've got to be open to throwing everything out.
And it just spins and spirals.
But the abduction thing was the last thing I was going to throw out. Which you'd think for a lot of people, it is.
So that's meaning the hardest thing for you to--
Acknowledge.
--acknowledge that that's the truth.
Yes. >> So ghost, you've got that.
Ghost, past lives, good.
Angels, great.
Fairies, awesome.
Aliens, no.
Mermaids?
Yes!
Yes on mermaids before alien abductions.
Yeah.
Wow.
OK, never mind.
That's good.
I really like mermaids.
I figured you would, that's why I brought it up.
So then, aliens.
So, aliens.
Aliens, in essence, aliens or alien abductions?
Was it the abduction phenomenon?
Abduction.
I was fine.
See, yet again, it's like star family is OK.
Alien abductions isn't.
And it's nice having had my own belief dot disconnect, because now I can see where it is for other people, which is just programming.
So in another part of the training, we had talked about star beings.
It's like, oh, you have other lives from Sirius and Pleiades.
And I was good with that.
I'm like, that sounds really cool.
I'm into that.
And then it's like, alien abduction?
No.
So I definitely had a disconnect.
But then as I started doing this and working with these different clients, I would have almost all of them were abductees.
And then I contacted the different people that I was trained with--
Male and female?
Or was it--
Male and female.
Yeah.
And I contacted the other women I was trained with.
And I said, are you getting abductees?
And they were like, no.
Like, uh, why am I getting all the abductees, you know?
I didn't want to.
There was nothing in my, like, ego or anything that wanted to.
But it was resonance for some reason.
So you were working with these people.
What did you call yourself, I guess?
A spiritual healer?
Or did you have a business card?
I had a business card.
I was a healer, I guess.
So I was a healer.
I did different shamanic work, trauma release, different stuff.
And then, more of the metaphysical things too.
So it was just like the full spectrum of whatever was needed.
OK, gotcha.
So I was healer.
And then you had other, I guess, coworkers, co-healers, that were also using the same modalities to help other people.
And that was colleagues that you could consult with.
Mm-hmm.
Got it.
Yeah, and none of them had had this--
And none of them had had an abduction.
None of them were getting abducted.
But had they heard of the abduction phenomenon prior?
Yeah, yeah.
OK.
And you had heard of it, too, from movies?
Well, that, and it was part of the healing training.
Oh, it was?
Yeah, just like a small segment.
So it was acknowledged.
And there was a checking.
It was kind of like a checklist of what could be out of alignment, or what could be the origin of discomfort or trauma.
And right there is, like, implants, like alien abduction.
And so I'd have to go through it every time, and every time that came up.
So I thought, hmm, it's coming up.
I need to look at this.
And so I did.
Yeah.
In what way?
In the way that, well, my dad was simultaneously in the conspiracy avenue.
And he was like, there are aliens.
There's evidence.
There's science.
And I'm on this metaphysical, like, healing side, being like, there's people saying they're abducted.
The government's covering it up.
It's a big thing.
Yeah, I've been down that path.
Exactly.
But it was good, because there was the science evidence aspect, and then there was me, like, having the experiential situations going on with these clients.
So we were like comparing and contrasting notes, you know?
He would be like, well I watched this abduction video where they were taking eggs and semen.
And then the person would be like, yeah, I saw myself on the table.
And so I had no context.
And it was just what these people were telling me.
And so it was two worlds kind of converging to support this new idea.
About how long ago was this, I guess, in day and age?
I guess, this was about four years ago, four or five years ago.
I see.
Yeah.
So enough information is out there, or had been out there at that time, to kind of put the puzzle pieces together.
And you had different aspects of the puzzle pieces, I see.
So what happened after that?
How did you help these people who claim to have abductions and implants too?
Did they claim to have implants?
Yeah.
So how would you go about helping them?
Well, we were told the greater story of the Zetas.
From..?
From the woman that was putting this on, she had that perspective via Lisa Royal and different people that she had studied.
So there was the Zeta--
The woman who trained you in the healing modalities?
Yeah.
OK.
So you actually got kind of a certification from her and stuff?
Uh-huh.
OK, I see.
And so she had this perspective of going, OK the Grays were this.
And they didn't have emotion, so there was this.
And then it caused trauma in people.
So we kind of had the objective perspective.
I went at it more from a trauma perspective, rather than trying to cope with the idea of aliens.
It was like, OK this was a trauma.
And it kind of feels like maybe a sexual trauma.
So like, how can we look at that?
And part of it, in any kind of healing modality, is just acknowledgment, just for it to be spoken.
And then that energy is like released.
And so that was probably like the biggest first step.
And I wouldn't go into it too much at that time.
I went into more of the other avenues that were up, but just acknowledging it and going through it in the session was what I did.
And by just bringing that up and acknowledging it, did you see a transformation in the people that you're working with?
Yeah.
Would they have memories that they would recall?
Yeah.
OK.
What was that like?
I mean, it was interesting, because as you know with the abductees, it's like, it's someone's personal experience.
And that is powerful.
And a lot of times, our sexual organs and our body parts are very personal to us.
So when those areas get violated, it hits home.
Yes.
Yeah, absolutely.
And so for me, it was just, like, compassion and going, whoa.
It just solidified that reality for them-- because it wasn't my reality-- was real.
And so it just brought that to a deeper place in me.
Yeah.
Yeah.
And you worked with enough people to verify that they weren't making it up.
Yeah.
And that's the thing.
No one wants to make up that they were abducted.
I don't think that this is like said enough.
There's no catalyst of popularity that is gonna come from saying that.
I agree.
I've spoken to-- I think I mentioned earlier, I've spoken to probably over 100 contactees.
Mix match, some abductees, experiencers, contactees, there's whole subcategories of that whole batch.
It's very hard.
Even government people who have high level positions and have everything in the world to lose by saying something like that.
And they're very brave, I think, the ones that do come forward and speak of it.
And they're very reluctant.
A lot of them that have kept secrets for 20, 30, 40, 50 years old.
So you said until that time, you hadn't associated it with a personal experience.
Then what happened?
Then, I had to honor the fear.
Because I was like OK well, I might not have personal experience.
But am I fearful of this idea, of ETs coming and taking me out of my bed?
Yeah, sure.
It was a hypothetical situation, still.
And then I watched "The Fourth Kind".
And "The Fourth Kind" changed it all.
In a positive, negative way?
Surprisingly, a positive way.
Because the show completely freaked me out.
So you would think that it would have repelled me even farther from looking at it.
But I'm strange.
And so then after watching it, I knew about the idea of hybrid children.
And so then I went to my room and I just asked, like with my full openness, like full heart-- I will go down whatever road this leads me.
Do I have hybrid children?
And well actually before that, it was through the healing stuff, it showed that you could be abducted in another life that was, like, kind of simultaneous to now, as well as this life.
And so I asked first, do I have hybrid kids from another life?
Still kind of like pushing it away.
Without asking the question directly.
And then I was just like..
Who would you ask?
Is this like a prayer to God?
That's a good question.
--or the universe?
Because a lot of people have different labels for their belief system.
So I'm just curious in how would you present that.
Right.
So by that time for me, I had a pretty clear attunement to many streams of different beings.
So I mean, I'm like, I had a very clear awareness of what an angel felt like, or what a guide felt like, or what an ancestor felt like, these different frequencies of asking.
And within the healing work that I did, it was all about creating a real visceral experience of your inter-dimensional support team that you have.
So like everyone has guardian angels.
Everyone has guides.
When you say inter-dimensional, that could also be extra-dimensional?
Yes.
So just these otherworldly beings?
Otherworldy beings, yeah.
And so I cultivated that really strong communication conduit to my own guidance system, as well as my higher self.
So it would be my guidance system and my higher self that I'd be asking.
And probably for this question, I was probably asking Source itself.
Like, all right, let's have it.
All of you guides, and the big cheese.
Yeah.
Is this the case?
And what was your answer?
The biggest yes I have ever received.
Like, it just hit me so hard.
And I just started bawling.
And it opened this emotional conduit in me that I don't think I had had this emotional an experience.
And up until this, you hadn't had any conscious sightings or lost time or abduction-type things?
Not that I remembered.
The only thing that was sticky that I could kind of look back to was when I was, I kept on having this really strong feeling that I was pregnant, a lot.
And I was a virgin.
And so that stuck with me my whole life, because I would always say it to my mom.
And she would say that I was strange.
And really, like no, you're not pregnant!
So that stuck.
That was, like, there.
So that was always there, even before you asked the question?
It was a little kind of, that was strange.
That was strange.
And looking back on it now, I mean, a lot of different memories have come back up.

But another thing that is strange that I haven't even put together really, until this past year, is from about age 8 to age 12, I would create these really large families of paper dolls-- like children and parents of all different shapes and sizes.
And my cousin and I would create little videos of these families in these different scenarios.
And just the way that we did it was not just like playing.
Like, there was some kind of an intimate relationship.
And there were way too many kids and certain style that both of us were coming from.
It was very odd and interesting.
So I feel like that was remembrance and a bringing through of things I had seen on the ship that was coming through.
So you asked the question.
You got a big knock on the head, yes.
Immediately, did memories and visions start pulling through of experiences?
Or how did you start to come to that realization?
What was the validation, I guess?
If you got a yes, I'm sure there had to be some sort of validation.
Right.
The validation-- I guess this is almost an answer to your question-- but was I could hear them.
Could hear the kids?
So the yes was from the kids.
And I could hear them.
And it was a portal.
And it was an energy stream from certain beings that I had never heard from before.
And so the full building of the spectrum of all the beings that I was connected to, validated like my communication and my confidence with these certain beings.
So by the time these kids started talking, I'm going, that's a new branch.
Like, this is a new energy.
This is a new thing.
And so that was validating based on all the other things that had built up my confidence in this healing extrasensory arena.
So what happened next?
I mean, after that, you got the hit in the head.
After that?
Then you started hearing these voices.
Did you communicate back with them?
Did you have conversations?
For the next probably five months, I had to sleep on it for five months, pretty much.
I knew that it was true.
But I was not ready to go forward or do anything with that.
Like it was just sitting, kind of like dormant, waiting to like burst to another level.
So I just kind of sat with it and let it digest for that long.
I see.
Did you sit on it with more downloads, or no?
No.
No, I just sat with it.
Didn't ask any more questions?
I didn't ask.
That was the only question that needed to be asked at that moment.
Yeah, gotcha.
You found out you have hybrid children.
You're part of this program.
What is the program, if you can... what's going on?
The program.
It's a program designed to help wake up humanity.
OK, the program designed to help wake up humanity.
And connect Earth with its greater other aspects, its galactic family.
So it's to merge galactic family with the Earth family, as well as wake up humanity.
And all those are waking up humanity, that process.
So it's a multi-level type program.
Yes.
There's many reasons to it, yes.
And one of them, which-- like I said, is the first time I even heard it put it that way, to help wake up humanity.
And I can totally see that happening.
But usually, it's perceived in a negative context.
Yes.

It starts with like the understanding of maybe a negative context through the abduction program, which most people know about, which is a connection of the Zeta Reticuli, which is a parallel reality human, and also is part of our original DNA strand in us, which is kind of freaky.
So it's like they're taking themselves, because it's themselves in another dimension, as well as we have that genetics in us.
So it's like taking family.
So it's much more intertwined and at home than seems to be some like beings like from another world, being like, aaaargh.
It's closer to home.
Right, but many aspects.
So it's multi-dimensional as far as them being an aspect of us having their DNA.
It's not just one thing.
Right.
Within that program--
--within that program, within all of that stuff--
--intergalactic contact.
--that's gonna wake us up.
I mean, that's gonna jostle people.
That's gonna like set off every trigger of the ego perceivable.
Well, it has.
I mean, if you talk to any of the thousands of abductees-- hundreds of thousands, and estimated millions-- then, it's rocked some worlds out there.
Yeah, definitely rocked some worlds.
Sounds like your world was rocked a little bit too?
Rocked my world.
Changed my world.
And in the program, which is commonly known, semen and eggs, genetic material is taken from these abductees.
And that is meant to create other beings, meant to create the five hybrid civilizations-- five different hybrid civilizations-- as well as the hybrid children, also known as the freelancers.
And these particular kids are the ones going to be coming to Earth.
So it's five civilizations that have their own planets, have evolved on, as well as these kids coming to Earth.
And all this has taken place in, give or take, about a 100 year period of Earth time.
Wow.
So, I mean, this is, hybrids from us, from humans.
So humanity is responsible for kind of igniting five other civilizations on other planets?
Yeah.
They each have their own planet.
They each have their own planet.
And so, wow, humans.
We're their ancestors.
And we don't even know.
No.
Our DNA is seeding these others, which makes you kind of think how many other civilizations seeded humanity?
Oh, I like that tie-in.
And if so, were those races even aware or conscious that they were seeding another civilization at the time?
So that's the big question you always see on "Ancient Aliens" or something. Are we - we're aliens!
You know, where do we come from?
The missing DNA chromosome.
We had a genetic leap from the apes.
What is that?
Where did that come from?
Yeah.
We're hybrids.

And distinguishing that-- I guess at this moment, is good-- is that we're all hybrids, and that it's a part of the greater galactic story that we seed each other-- that we seed consciousness, that we seed beings.
So say, the abduction program taken just in that context, it might seem weird.
But in a greater context, it's like, well who seeded us?
And with that, to my knowledge or what I've gotten, is that there's seven different extraterrestrial genetics that are involved in the seeding of us.
And that have then gone forward.
And so we have those lineages in us.
And that's why our genetic material is awesome for the Grays to utilize in creating the hybrid civilizations, as well as the hybrid children.
So you mentioned Grays.
Let's just kind of identify that a little bit.
Grays, meaning, is that the typical term for the beings from the Zeta Reticuli?
Yeah.
And that's mostly these beings that you see in movies.
Yeah, big eyes, big heads.
There's a lot different kinds.
You know, there's ones that are super negatively-oriented, ones that have worked with the government.
There's a few different kinds, different timelines.
So we can say-- and I'm glad you mentioned that.
So we see these Gray beings, doesn't necessarily mean just like with humans, we have different color skin mean just like with humans, we have different color skin humans.
Not all the Grays-- even though they may be grayish-- are there some brown Grays?
I think that they're all pretty gray.
But they could have different, say motivations or different energies.
So there are some that are like incredibly benevolent.
And then there's some that have really taken a turn based on this hybrid program, and come to a little bit more of a balanced place.
So you think initially, the ones before they engaged into this hybridization program, were maybe not as nice?
Well, there they're fifth dimensional beings, but they're negatively-oriented.
So they have all the technology.
They have of the genetic know-how.
They have all of that.
But they are negatively-oriented, and they're more hive mentality.
And so at the beginning of the program, it was a lot more intense.
They didn't know how to work with humans because they genetically modified their emotions out of themselves.

But through this program, we sparked something in them that made them, to the best of their ability, understand more of the emotional body, and start to understand how to work with us in a way that doesn't completely freak us out.
So probably the abductions that are happening now are less aggressive, a little more compassionate than maybe some of the abductions that were happening 10 or 20 years ago, in the early days.
In the Benny and Barney Hill, the Whitney Strieber and some of these early records that we have of this happening.
Exactly.
Interesting.
Yeah.
Are there still bad ones out there, you think?
Yeah.
When we say bad?
You know, I mean like ones that aren't as compassionate, I would say, like that.
And for the most part, most of the Zeta Reticuli have died off.
Interesting.
That's why there was an urgency to do this, you know.
Because they couldn't reproduce.
And so they needed a way to continue on, in a way that was continuing on with them, which is us, in a different way.
